Module ingsw.codex_naturalis
Package ingsw.codex_naturalis.client.view.gui

Class GraphicalUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
ingsw.codex_naturalis.client.view.gui.GraphicalUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI
public class GraphicalUI extends javafx.application.Application implements UI
This class is the graphical interface of the client.

  • Constructor Details

    • GraphicalUI

      public GraphicalUI()
      Constructor for the ViewGUI class. It creates a new Client object and connects to the server. Then it initializes a map containing the names of the scenes and their paths. This will be used to set the scene of the stage
